overview: Frustrated by the feminist movement and women's fears about good old fashioned, lesbian sex, Kendra sets out to give her stepdaughter, Karlie, some hands-on instruction. Passions ignite after Dana admits to her stepdaughter, Raven, that she steals her underwear so she can feel closer to her. Kenna's courage to come out as a lesbian inspires her stepmother, Tanya, to do the same one steamy afternoon. An ongoing affair between Jelena and her stepdaughter, Marley, reaches a breaking point when Marley begins seeing other people.
title: A Mother Daughter Thing 3
